verbose_text: We were particularly intrigued by the identification of RBFOX2 mRNA as a target of CELF2 dependent APA, as we have previously reported that CELF2 represses the expression of RBFOX2 protein to control splicing of a broad program of RBFOX2-target genes; however, the mechanism by which CELF2 regulates RBFOX2 expression was unknown.
